testsuite.name: opportunity.LOU_OP_OP_Business_Flow_Test
testsuite.system-out:
Clicked on Leads on Side Menu
Clicked on add lead
Lead is assigned
Added data in General Notes
Customer type - Business selected
Clicked on Add new vehicle request
Channel- Retail Sales Selected
Vehicle request for broker has been saved
Click on Map New Quote icon
Click on acquisition contract type icon
Click on customer contract type icon
Click on search button
Click on created date button 1st
Click on created date button 2nd
New Quote has been mapped with lead
click ok button on Map new quote
Verifying Quote no. and Sales Price Displayed in the Table
Expected IJF16970 and Actual IJF16970 are equal , Hence Passed
Expected 9550.00 and Actual £ 9,550.00 are equal , Hence Passed
Click on Lead save and Convert button
Verifying Quote no. and Sales Price Displayed in the Table
Expected IJF16970 and Actual IJF16970 are equal , Hence Passed
Expected 9550.00 and Actual £ 9,550.00 are equal , Hence Passed

In Lead created Opportunity Id is =PY-7448

Clicked on Opportunity link from Menu
Enter the Opportunity id in Search Text box
Current Status of Opportunity Status value is = Open
Current Status of Proposal value is = Proposal Required
Current Status of Channel value is = Draft
Current Status of Quote ref is = Draft
Status Verified : Before sending the proposal

click on Proposal icon
Proposal page will display
Send proposal to customer pop up will open
Click on Manual fill radio button - Yes
Click on manually submit behalf of customer link

Current Status of Opportunity Status value is = Open
Current Status of Proposal value is = Proposal Received
Current Status of Channel value is = Draft
Current Status of Quote ref is = Draft

Current Status of Proposal value is = Proposal Received
Current Status of Channel value is = Sent to customer
Current Status of Quote ref is = Sent to customer
Status Verified : Status Verified : Sent to customer

Status code 200 received
Enter the Opportunity id in Search Text box

Current Status of Proposal value is = Proposal Received
Current Status of Channel value is = Contract signed
Current Status of Quote ref is = Contract signed
Status Verified : Contract Signed
